title: [Silvergate, Marble Tub]
description: Immersed in warm and soapy water beneath a sculpted naiad holding her jug at an angle above the tub, you can't help but feel yourself relaxing.  Every so often you find your body sinking lower and lower into the water, your eyelids getting heavier and heavier.  You feel like you could stay in here for hours!
